## Restock Recommendation

| Parameter                         | Value                                     |
|-----------------------------------|-------------------------------------------|
| Recommended Order Size            | 15,000 units                            |
| Rationale                         | Ordering 15,000 units allows us to meet forecasted demand for 5 days while incorporating a safety buffer to account for demand variability. This order size also covers the player's planned purchase of 10,000 units, ensuring availability while also facilitating a larger purchase for potential discounts. This order size utilizes the closest available vendor quantity while optimizing for inventory turnover and minimizing excess stock. |
| Comparison with Player's Plan     | Order is 5,000 units higher than the player's planned purchase, providing a safety buffer to address potential demand fluctuations. |
| Estimated Stock Turnover Days     | 3.3 days (Assuming the forecasted demand of 18,368 units is realized) |
| Forecasted Demand Coverage Days   | 5 days (Assuming the forecasted demand of 18,368 units is realized) |
| Comments                          | It's crucial to maintain an adequate safety stock to avoid stockouts and ensure consistent supply. This recommendation balances the need for a sufficient buffer against the risk of carrying excessive inventory. |
